Job Title: Mgr, Business Planning

Location: Centennial, CO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Spectrum’s Product and Technology team creates, develops, and operates the nation’s fastest mobile service, most reliable internet service, most viewed live TV app, and the most advanced WiFi, serving nearly 100 million users and 500 million devices. We are transforming the next era of connectivity and entertainment experiences. The diversity of experience available within Spectrum’s Product and Technology team is unmatched and there are opportunities to grow your career as a designer, architect, engineer, developer, operator, or data scientist. We are creative, disciplined, hard-working, complex-problem solvers that believe in collaborating to deliver the highest quality customer experience.

Spectrum’s Data Services department manages data throughout the organization. Teams within this department work on a series of platforms spanning Spectrum to achieve various business goals. The Product and Technology Business Planning Department is primarily responsible for the oversight of the monthly financials, quarterly forecast and annual budget.

BE PART OF THE CONNECTION

As a Manager on the “Business Planning” team, you’ll be responsible for supporting the operational and financial planning and analysis needs of an organization. Additionally, you will provide integrated analysis of financial and operational metrics and you will be responsible for managing the successful development and execution of data-driven financial reporting and data analysis.

What Our Managers Enjoy Most

Visibility to work with leaders of the SDIT OrganizationComplete ownership and responsibility of Opex and Capex Cross functional partnership with many areas of the business (HR, Procurement, Accounting, other Business Units)Encouraged to have a “voice” in the department and identify process improvements leveraging existing tools

Required Qualifications

WHAT YOU’LL BRING TO SPECTRUM
